content: At the bottom of https://backdropcms.org/user-guide/themes there is the link "Sources: http://themery.com/dgd7" which points to a Pantheon 404 page. (I've no idea where the link was supposing to point to.)
@Olaf Grabienski at some point it was https://web.archive.org/web/20160826195837/http://themery.com/dgd7
Perhaps the link could be updated to use that one
Updated, thanks @Olaf Grabienski and @Herb
